channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ChatGPT hallucinated about music app Soundslice so often, the founder made the lie come true

item.title: Best Prime Day Beauty Deals 2025: Hair, Skin, and Dental Care
item.description: Prime Day’s beauty bargains are live. We tested the gadgets, tracked the prices, and scanned hundreds of deals to find what’s actually worth it.

item.title: 13 Best Prime Day Pet Deals on Amazon (2025)
item.description: Amazon Prime Day has expanded to four days. From automatic litter boxes to at-home DNA test kits, these are the best pet-related deals we’ve found.

item.title: How startups are rewriting the late-stage playbook at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: David George of a16z joins the Going Public stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, Moscone West in San Francisco, from October 27–29. Register now.

item.title: YouTube prepares crackdown on ‘mass-produced’ and ‘repetitive’ videos, as concern over AI slop grows
item.description: YouTube's creator liaison said the change is a "minor" update to YouTube's longstanding policies.

item.title: Blok is using AI personas to simulate real-world app usage

item.title: Apple looks to bid on becoming US home for Formula 1

item.title: 19 Best Prime Day Coffee Maker Deals on Machines, Grinders, and More
item.description: If you need to mainline some caffeine, these are the best brewers and concentrates to get that java into your system.

item.title: Linda Yaccarino Tried to Tame X. Now She’s Out as CEO
item.description: Yaccarino announced Wednesday she’s stepping down, and it’s not clear if the platform’s owner, Elon Musk, plans to announce a successor.

item.title: A New Kind of AI Model Lets Data Owners Take Control
